room_title: Escape room "Diamond Heist" by Mastermind Room Escape in St. Louis
room_description:
Information has leaked that a world-renowned diamond is being appraised today. Only the most skillful thieves would dare to attempt an operation of this magnitude. Your task is to break into a high-security vault, disable the alarms, locate the diamond and escape without detection. Does your team have what it takes to pull off the ultimate heist?
This escape room is also available at the St. Charles location: 3900 Old Hwy 94 S #1, St Charles, MO 63304. The contact phone number is 636-373-7801.
